stripped_text: While this ice is the only piece of ice protecting this server, it gets +4 strength. Subroutine You may install 1 card from HQ. Subroutine End the run.
text:
While this ice is the only piece of ice protecting this server, it gets +4 strength.
[subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ.
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Scatter Field
